title: 23. The Return Of America
itunes:title: 23. The Return Of America
description: America's coming back. After several weeks of being completely shut down because of the Coronavirus pandemic, President Trump unveiled plans to open the economy back up. In today's episode, we talk about opening the country, what's happening to our freedoms, and why financial literacy is important during times of crisis.
